game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a terrible curse, and the only way to lift it is to retrieve the Sword of Light. Brave adventurer, will you answer the call?
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness, and the gratitude of the people of Oakwood

tasks.objective: Gather information about the Lost Temple's location
tasks.description: Speak with the villagers, gather rumors and clues to uncover the temple's whereabouts

tasks.objective: Explore the ancient ruins of the Moon Goddess
tasks.description: Delve into the long-abandoned temple, navigate treacherous traps and puzzles to reach the inner sanctum
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess

tasks.description: Face your deepest fears and overcome the dark forces that have desecrated the temple, claim the Sword of Light as your reward
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess - Inner Sanctum
